page.title: 18A Typical Day-Mr K Attwood
page.content: This is a description of a typical day in the life of Keith Attwood. He gets up at 6.45am,combs his hair,washes his face and cleans his teeth.Then he goes downstairs and has a cup of tea.He gets in his van and goes to work.He works in Scunthorpe at Scunthorpe Steel Works.It takes about three quarters of an hour to get there.He gets home at about 5.45pm and has his tea.Then he sits down and watches the news on television.He watches television for most of the night.At about 10.00pm he lets the dogs out so they can go to the toilet and then watches the television until about 11.30pm when he has a bath,cleans his teeth and goes to bed.
